title: U.S. CPI Inflation Slows to 0.1% in May; Bitcoin Rises
description: The news on consumer prices comes one day ahead of the results of the Fed's latest monetary policy meeting.

title: TUSD regains $1 parity after three-day depeg
description:
TrueUSD (TUSD) has regained parity with the U.S. dollar. The stablecoin lost true parity with the US Dollar on June 10 amid mounting community concerns over its minting and redemption activities. On June 10, TUSD depegged from the $1 mark after its team paused minting activities via Prime Trust, a Nevada-based crypto custodial firm. Following […]

The post TUSD regains $1 parity after three-day depeg appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Technical Analysis: BTC Above $26,000 Ahead of US Inflation Report
description: Bitcoin rose above the $26,000 level on Tuesday, as markets prepared for the latest U.S. inflation figures. Consumer prices for May are expected to fall to 4.1% — double the Federal Reserve’s 2% target. Ethereum remained below $1,800. title: MATIC Surges as Polygon Unveils ‘Polygon 2.0’ and Value Layer Upgrade
description:
Polygon Labs, the pioneering force behind Polygon 2.0, has revealed its ambitious blueprint for revolutionizing the internet by creating the Value Layer. This groundbreaking upgrade encompasses a comprehensive reimagination of Polygon, from protocol architecture to tokenomics to governance.
